entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20 except minus 14 along the coast.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 20 except minus 14 along the coast. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 28 February 2023
